description: This contract is to purchase  Electric Forklift. The Government of Canada needs one. The date of delivery is Mar 30, 2023. The contract will be placed in Alberta. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police contact regarding the procurement is Shawna Johnson, Tele: 780-670-8583, email: shawna.johnston@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Forklift Acquisition
#### Solicitation Reference
* Solicitation Reference: PW-23-01024347
* Publication Date: February 1, 2023
* Closing Date: February 15, 2023, at 15:00:00
* Status: Expiré (Expired)

#### Contracting Entity Details
* Contracting Agency: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Address: 73 Leikin Dr
* City: Ottawa
* Province: Ontario
* Postal Code: K1A OR2
* Country: Canada
* Contact:
  * Name: Shawna Johnston
  * Phone: 780-670-8583
  * Email: shawna.johnston@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

#### Acquisition Details
* Goods Category: Truck, Forklift, Electric (Chariot, élévateur à fourche, électrique)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta

#### Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a specialized Goods category 2A electric forklift, Configuration B, under the Supplies Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Pre-qualification for the RFSA can be obtained at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868).

#### Required Delivery
The requested delivery date for the goods specified is March 30, 2023. This solicitation will be open only to suppliers holding a valid SA under the RFSA E60HS-21FRKL/A. Suppliers must register on the of Buyandsell.gc.ca to access the notice and the RFSA documentation.

Please ensure to review the specifications and submit your bid according to the closing date mentioned above. You can reach the procurement contact person, Shawna Johnston, at the contact details mentioned above if you have any queries.
